name: Super Autoscrolling Space Robot GROWZINGER
description:
Flying through space, constantly growing, GROWZINGER is hot-blooded forced scrolling giant robot action.

Press UP to jump, and DOWN to crouch.

Tools: Unity, PxTone, 2D Toolkit, GIMP

Ludum Dare 34 entry: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=20078
